Package com.eventmaster.backend.controller

Class OrganizerController

java.lang.Object
com.eventmaster.backend.controller.OrganizerController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/organizer") public class OrganizerController extends Object
A class which handles the HTTP-requests for organizer functions.
Author:
Fabian Unger

    • getManagingEventsInOrga

      @PostMapping("/orga/{orgaId}/event/managing/get/{userMail}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Event>> getManagingEventsInOrga(@PathVariable String userMail, @PathVariable long orgaId)
      Endpoint to get all managing events in a organisation.
      Parameters:
      userMail - Mail of the organizer.
      orgaId - ID of the organisation.
      Returns:
      List of events.

    • createEvent

      @PostMapping("/event/create/{userMail}/{orgaId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<MessageResponse> createEvent(@RequestParam("event") String eventJson, @RequestParam(value="image",required=false) org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image, @PathVariable String userMail, @PathVariable long orgaId) throws IOException
      Endpoint to create an event.
      Parameters:
      eventJson - Data of the event
      image - Image of the event
      userMail - Mail of user who created event and becomes organizer.
      orgaId - Organisation which will contain the event.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • createEventSeries

      @PostMapping(value="/event-series/create/{userMail}/{orgaId}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createEventSeries(@RequestParam("event") String eventJson, @RequestParam("eventseries") String eventSeriesJson, @RequestParam(value="image",required=false) org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image, @PathVariable String userMail, @PathVariable long orgaId) throws IOException
      Endpoint to create a series of events.
      Parameters:
      eventJson - Data of the first Event of the series
      eventSeriesJson - Data of the eventseries
      image - Image of the events.
      userMail - Mail of user who created the events and becomes organizers.
      orgaId - ID of the organisation.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.
      Throws:
      IOException

      Endpoint to change a series of events.
      Parameters:
      eventSeries - New EventSeries with information about time interval between events.
      startEvent - New start event of the series.
      Returns:
      String about success or failure.
